structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 11, effective July 1, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 312, sec. 9. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 254, sec. 9. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-152.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Drinking or being under influence of alcoholic beverages in public place prohibited.
